attributes.action: Liberty, Sovereignty, Justice & Democracy is under threat
attributes.additional_details:
A history suppressed, technology kept secret, liberty taken, sovereignty destroyed, patriotism shattered, religion under siege, science & medicine corrupted, education restricted, a media built on sand, minds manipulated, water poisoned, food genetically modified, terrorism in the name of politics, money wasted, children molested...Freedom no more.

Our very way of life is under threat, our society shadowed in secrecy, our brothers and sisters kept uneducated, some without food, some without shelter, some without purpose.

While we slept and put our trust in our fellow man, they failed us, using our trust and our money against us. Secret societies have infiltrated the very foundations of our society, in secrecy, through secret oaths and secret alliances.

Media, politics, judicial system, law enforcement, military, space organisation, science & medicine, education, religion to give examples, have fallen to secret societies who work in the shadows.
